passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(5) > section > section-wrapper:nth-child(3) > header:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > main:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > section > section-wrapper:nth-child(1) > section-header > h1
html > body > main:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > section > section-wrapper:nth-child(2) > section-content > iframe:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer > section-wrapper > section-content > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer > section-wrapper > section-content > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > footer > section-wrapper > section-content > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > div > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
